turban, much to the bemusement of his fellow students.
After graduating, he moved to Syria and spent two years there practicing his
Arabic, even adopting the name Sheikh Ibrahim Ibn Abdallah, and attempting to
pass himself off as a Muslim. It's not clear how successful Burckhardt's
